A '''potato door''' is a variant of the [[door]] made of [[potato planks]] that can be opened and closed by the [[player]] without [[redstone]], only present in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Potato doors can be broken with anything, but [[axe]]s are the fastest. Potato doors drop themselves if they no longer have a block beneath them that can support them.

{{Breaking row|horizontal=1|Potato Door|axe|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Potato doors generate naturally as part of [[potato village]]s.

=== Crafting ===

== Usage ==
{{For|information about all doors|Door#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Potato doors can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass" sounds.

=== Block states ===
{{See also|Block states}}

{{bst|facing|north|east,north,south,west|The direction the door's "inside" is facing.<br>The direction the player faces while placing the door.<br>For example, a door facing east occupies the west part of its block when closed.}}
{{bst|half|lower|lower,upper|Identifies which part of the door the block is.}}
{{bst|hinge|left|left,right|Identifies the side the hinge is on (when facing the same direction as the door's inside).}}
{{bst|open|false|false,true|True if the door is currently open.}}
{{bst|powered|false|false,true|True if the door is currently powered by redstone.|foot=1}}
